value.original: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

row.value: 一个商业伙伴是与你进行商业交易的任何人。可以包括供应商、客户、职员或销售人员

value.original: The Sales Transaction checkbox indicates if this item is a Sales Transaction.

row.value: 表示该项是否为一个销售事务
删除已存在的会计分录

value.original: The selected accounting entries will be deleted! DANGEROUS !!!

row.value: 所选的会计分录将被删除! 危险 !!!

value.original: Only used if Price List is used to set future/standard cost price

row.value: 只使用如果价格表用来设置未来/标准成本价格

value.original: Overwrite how to pay the invoice
The Payment Rule indicates how the incoice will be settled - you can overwrite the value from the invoice.

row.value: 付款规则指此发票会如何处置，你可以在发票覆盖该值
内部或业务伙伴的联系人

value.original: The email is sent from the user selected - otherwise it is sent from the request email address of the client

row.value: 标识内部或业务伙伴的联系人
账龄计算的截至日期，不填则默认为系统日期

value.original: The Statement Date field defines the date of the statement.

row.value: 账龄计算的截至日期，不填则默认为系统日期

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: 用户可以使用名称和密码登录到系统。对应实际场景，他/她/它既可以是公司系统的内部用户，也可以是业务伙伴的联系人。

value.original: Organizational entity within client - set to empty if you want to create a new organization

row.value: 链接到的目标组织，如果你要链接到一个新组织，则置为空

value.original: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

row.value: 组织是实体或组织的一个单位 - 例如仓库、部门，你可以在组织间共享数据

value.original: Organization Type allows you to categorize your organizations for reporting purposes

row.value: 指定新组织的组织类型。

value.original: If no Role is selected, grant access to all (non-manual) roles of the Client
The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: 指定可访问新组织的角色，如果留空，则所有（非手动）角色可访问该新建组织

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact

row.value: 内部或业务伙伴的联系人

value.original: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: 标识内部或业务伙伴的联系人

value.original: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

row.value: 为工作流最终负责的是实际的用户。工作流负责人允许定义找到该实际用户的方式

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact

row.value: 内部或业务伙伴的联系人

value.original: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: 标识内部或业务伙伴的联系人

value.original: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

row.value: 为工作流最终负责的是实际的用户。工作流负责人允许定义找到该实际用户的方式

value.original: If not defined on Business Partner Level

row.value: 如果没有定义业务伙伴级别
包含未确认发货的订单

value.original: Generate shipments for Orders with open delivery confirmations?

row.value: 为未全部发货确认的订单生成发货单

value.original: You can also include orders who have outstanding confirmations (e.g. ordered=10 - not confirmed shipments=4 - would create a new shipment of 6 if available).

row.value: 包含有未确认发货的销售订单，是否创建本次发货（比如：销售订单数量 = 10，未确认发货 = 4，如果可供货则将创建新的发货数量= 6）

value.original: The targeted status of the document
You find the current status in the Document Status field. The options are listed in a popup

row.value: “选择”表示加密，“不选择”表示解密

value.original:
Display encryption (in Window/Tab/Field) - all characters are displayed as '*' - in the database it is stored in clear text. You will not be able to report on these columns.
Data storage encryption (in Table/Column) - data is stored encrypted in the database (dangerous!) and you will not be able to report on those columns. Independent from Display encryption.

row.value: 列内容（明文）的最大长度。不修改列长度时，加密结果与列长度比较，如果超过原长度，无法保存

value.original: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: 角色决定安全性，以及含有该角色的用户所具有的系统访问权限

value.original: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: 角色决定安全性，以及含有该角色的用户所具有的系统访问权限

value.original: After take email form inbox folder, and process it success, email will move to this folder

row.value: 请求邮件从收件箱文件夹接收，成功处理后，移动到该文件夹

value.original: folder can define as hierarchy, use "\" to separate folder. example customer\vietnam will read email from folder vietnam under folder customer after take email form inbox folder, and process it success, email will move to this folder

row.value: 文件夹使用“\”来表示层级。比如：“客户\某某公司”。邮件将从收件夹移动到指定的请求邮件文件夹

value.original: Mail folder, where process will take email and make request

row.value: 接收邮件，待生成请求的文件夹

value.original: folder can define as hierarchy, use "\" to separate folder. example customer\vietnam will read email from folder vietnam under folder customer

row.value: 文件夹使用“\”来表示层级。比如：“客户”

value.original: Mail folder to push unsuccess email

row.value: 发送不成功的邮件文件夹

value.original: folder can define as hierarchy, use "\" to separate folder. example customer\error\vietnam will puss email can't process to folder vietnam under folder error under folder customer

row.value: 文件夹使用“\”来表示层级。比如：“客户\失败”

value.original: The Shipment Date indicates the date printed on the shipment.

row.value: 装运日期指装运单上的打印日期

value.original: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only.

row.value: 打印后催款记录即标识为“已处理”

value.original: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only. This allows you to reprint only certain dunning entries.

row.value: 这允许你重新打印某个催款条目

value.original: Number of days to keep the log entries

row.value: 超过该天数的通知，将被删除。

value.original: Older Log entries may be deleted

row.value: 超过该天数的通知，将被删除。

value.original: Includes only the Tabs that Insert records

row.value: 只包含新增记录的页签

value.original: Generated Export Format for the Tabs with Insert Record is Yes

row.value: 为新增记录页签创建导出格式：是

value.original: Generated an Export Format Line if the column is mandatory

row.value: 如果此字段必填，创建一个导出格式行
按指定日期计算发票余额
选择后，按指定日期计算发票余额，只显示”过期“发票。

value.original: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion.

row.value:
比如：3月底发票100，4月底到期，5月底付款80，当前6月未清20。
指定4月初，未到期（负账龄），发票未清0。
指定5月初，过期，发票未清100
指定6月初，过期，发票未清20
默认按发票实际余额显示账龄，无论指定日期，发票未清余额一直是20。

value.original: Date format used in the input format

row.value: 用于输入格式的日期格式

value.original: The date format is usually detected, but sometimes need to be defined.

row.value: 日期格式通常自动检测，但有时需要定义

value.original: Valid from including this date (first day)

row.value: 有效起始日期, 包括当日 (第一天)

value.original: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range

row.value: 有效起始日期表示日期范围的第一天

value.original: Only documents within this date range which are also in open periods will be reset.

row.value: 只有此日期范围内、并且处于开放期间的文件才会被重置
区域列表无法找到目标城市，可直接输入城市名称

value.original: Define if this client will use business partner accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: 若该实体使用业务伙伴科目维度，请定义该值。它可以在此实体的会计科目表窗口修改

value.original: Define if this client will use product accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: 若该实体使用产品科目维度，请定义该值。它可以在此实体的会计科目表窗口修改

value.original: Define if this client will use project accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: 若该实体使用项目科目维度，请定义该值。它可以在此实体的会计科目表窗口修改

value.original: Define if this client will use campaign accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: 若该实体使用竞标科目维度，请定义该值。它可以在此实体的会计科目表窗口修改

value.original: Define if this client will use sales region accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: 若该实体使用销售区域科目维度，请定义该值。它可以在此实体的会计科目表窗口修改

value.original: Location of the chart of accounts to be used with this client. At this stage just the default accounts will be created.

row.value: 此实体使用会计科目表文件的存放位置。
【注意】在本阶段，只会导入系统缺省账户所对应的科目。如果要导入所有会计科目，需要从[系统-数据-导入-科目表]位置重新导入其他科目。

value.original: Delete all existing summary data and recalculate.

row.value: 无论上次重算时间，删除所有存在的汇总数据并重新插入计算结果

value.original: If not selected, only those periods with recently posted accounting facts will be recalculated.

row.value: 如果不选择，上次重算时间以前的历史数据不参与计算，只计算最近的过账数据

value.original: Force rebuild of cube even if locked.

row.value: 即使立方体被锁定，也强制重建数据结果

value.original: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
The Amount indicates the amount for this document line.
The Production Quantity identifies the number of products to produce

row.value: The Production Quantity identifies the number of products to produce

value.original: Create a new Sales Opportunity when converting a lead

row.value: 当可以转换为一个销售线索时，创建一个新的销售机会
重置用户已存在的权限访问记录
重置用户已存在的权限访问记录

value.original: Please enter the product (component) you wish to search for

row.value: 请输入你要搜索的产品（组件）

row.value: 唯一的有效日期格式为：YYYY-MM

row.value: 唯一的有效日期格式为：YYYY-MM

row.value: 唯一的有效日期格式为：YYYY-MM

row.value: 唯一的有效日期格式为：YYYY-MM
库存成本调整单据类型

value.original: Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization

The Entity Types "Dictionary", "iDempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!

row.value: 只有符合该类型的列才被创建，不是指定页签字段的实体类类型。
指定时间，进一步筛选列的范围
使用默认的科目表（美国）

value.original: Define if this client will use activity accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define if this client will use activity accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client
【新手建议】使用系统缺省科目
使用缺省科目，系统将自动填入所有自动记账账户（大概100+位置）。如果不使用缺省，用户需要自己手工填入指定的科目。如果正式实施财务模块，需要一一确认所有自动记账账户，可以选择此项。

value.original: True if other folder (request, error,..) occupy in inbox folder
Some email server as outlook, every folder occupy in inbox, with web mail as google, we easy create my folder outside inbox folder. this field define where request, error,.. occupy.

row.value: Some email server as outlook, every folder occupy in inbox, with web mail as google, we easy create my folder outside inbox folder. this field define where request, error,.. occupy.
